original_title: The Ballad of Hector the Stowaway Dog
overview: Dog of an officer of the merchant navy, Hector wanders during a stopover in Lisbon. Captured by smugglers, he was soon used as a mule in a case of diamond smuggling. But this is not counting on his innate sense of justice and law...
title: The Ballad of Hector the Stowaway Dog
